import React,{useState} from 'react' import { motion,AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion' const Main = () => { const [slide,setSlide]=useState(false) const header={ show:{ opacity:1, x:0, transition:{ type:"tween" , stiffness:400, duration:1.5 } }, hidden:{ opacity:0, x:-500 }, exit:{ x:-500, opacity:0, transition:{ type:"tween", stiffness:400, duration:1.5} } } setInterval(()=>{ setSlide(!slide) },20000) return (
{slide&&
